ResourceHeader.ResourceName: DMSP F17 Special Sensor J, SESS/SSJ5, Precipitating Electrons and Ions Observed at 850 km, 1 s Data

RevisionEvent.Note: Only known prior ReleaseDate of the metadata
Added DOI and PublicationInfo minted by LFB, metadata versioned up to SPASE 2.6.0, reviewed by LFB 20230727

ResourceHeader.Description: Precipitating Electrons And ions observed at nominally 850 km Altitude and over a Range of Energies from 30 eV to 30 keV by using the Special Sensor J, SSJ, Instrument. Please contact Rob.Redmon@noaa.gov with Questions and Comments. Many Individuals made Important Contributions including: D. Hardy, E. Holeman, F. Rich, D. Ober, G. Wilson, J. Machuzak, K. Kadinsky-Cade, J. McGarity, W.F. Denig, K. Martin, R. Redmon, D. Knipp, L. Kilcommons.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: R.J. Redmon, L.M. Kilcommons, Data Access provided by NGDC in Coordination with AFRL and the University of Colorado, Boulder. Please acknowledge the Data Providers. If you find Problems, please report them.

PublicationInfo.Authors: Redmon, Robert, J.; Kilcommons, Liam, M.

Parameter.Name: Epoch Time
Parameter.Description: Epoch Time, Default
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter exhibits an increasing monotonic progression.

Parameter.Name: Channel Center Energies
Parameter.Description: Channel Center Energies

Parameter.Name: Electrons, Counts, 30 eV to 30 keV
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Electrons, Counts, 30 eV to 30 keV, as observed, no Corrections

Parameter.Name: Electrons, Background Count
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Electrons, Background Count, Estimated
Parameter.Caveats: This Instrument does not have a dedicated Background Channel. An Estimate is arrived at by running the AFRL Technique forward and backward in Time and choosing the Largest of these two Estimates for each Second and Energy Channel.

Parameter.Name: Electrons, Channel Geometric Factors
Parameter.Description: Electrons, Channel Geometric Factors

Parameter.Name: Electrons, Differential Energy Flux
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Electrons, Differential Energy Flux

Parameter.Name: Electrons, Differential Energy Flux, Uncertainty
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Electrons, Differential Energy Flux, Estimated Fractional Uncertainty

Parameter.Name: Electrons, Total Energy Flux Integrated over Energy
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Electrons, Total Energy Flux Integrated over Energy

Parameter.Name: Electrons, Total Energy Flux Integrated over Energy, no Error Bars
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Electrons, Total Energy Flux Integrated over Energy, without Error Bars
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: ELE_TOTAL_ENERGY_FLUX.

Parameter.Name: Electrons, Total Energy Flux Integrated over Energy, Uncertainty
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Electrons, Total Energy Flux Integrated over Energy, Estimated Fractional Uncertainty

Parameter.Name: Electrons, Average Energy
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Electrons, Average Energy
Parameter.Caveats: Computed as: Total Energy Flux divided by the Total Number Flux

Parameter.Name: Electrons, Average Energy, no Error Bars
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Electrons, Average Energy, without Error Bars
Parameter.Caveats: Computed as: Total Energy Flux divided by the Total Number Flux This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: ELE_AVG_ENERGY.

Parameter.Name: Electrons, Average Energy, Uncertainty
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Electrons, Average Energy, Estimated Fractional Uncertainty

Parameter.Name: Ions, Counts, 30 eV to 30 keV
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Ions, Counts, 30 eV to 30 keV, as observed, no Corrections,

Parameter.Description: Ions, Background Count, Estimated
Parameter.Caveats: This Instrument does not have a dedicated Background Channel. An Estimate is arrived at by running the AFRL Technique forward and backward in Time and choosing the Largest of these two Estimates for each Second and Energy Channel.

Parameter.Description: Ions, Channel Geometric Factors

Parameter.Caveats: Computed as: Total Energy Flux divided by the Total Number Flux This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: ION_AVG_ENERGY.

Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Ions, Average Energy, Estimated Fractional Uncertainty

Parameter.Name: Spacecraft Position, ECI
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Spacecraft Position, Earth Centered Inertial, ECI, Cartesian Coordinates
Parameter.Caveats: Epoch is True of Date, TOD. These ECI Coordinates are calculated from an SPDF SSC Locator 1 min Ephemeris using an Eight Order Interpolation, Burden, R.L., and Faires, J.D., Numerical Analysis, 5th Ed., PWS Publishing Company, Boston, 1993. Using SPDF Methods, expected Accuracy is on the Order of a few km.

Parameter.Name: Spacecraft Latitude, GEO
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Spacecraft Latitude, Geographic Inertial, GEO, Coordinates
Parameter.Caveats: Calculated by using IDL Astro Library Function ECI2GEO

Parameter.Name: Spacecraft Longitude, GEO
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Spacecraft Longitude, Geographic Inertial, GEO, Coordinates
Parameter.Caveats: Calculated by using IDL Astro Library Function ECI2GEO

Parameter.Name: Spacecraft Geocentric Distance
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Spacecraft Geocentric Distance

Parameter.Name: Spacecraft Latitude, AACGM
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Spacecraft Latitude, Altitude Adjusted Corrected Geomagnetic, AACGM, Coordinates
Parameter.Caveats: Calculated by using the SuperDARN AACGM IDL Library. Values are the Result of linearly interpolating between two nearest AACGM 5 Year Epochs.

Parameter.Name: Spacecraft Longitude, AACGM
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Spacecraft Longitude, Altitude Adjusted Corrected Geomagnetic, AACGM, Coordinates
Parameter.Caveats: Calculated by using the SuperDARN AACGM IDL Library. Values are the Result of linearly interpolating between two nearest AACGM 5 Year Epochs.

Parameter.Name: Spacecraft Local Time, AACGM
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Spacecraft Local Time, Altitude Adjusted Corrected Geomagnetic, AACGM, Coordinates
Parameter.Caveats: Calculated by using the SuperDARN AACGM IDL Library. Values are the Result of linearly interpolating between two nearest AACGM 5 Year Epochs.
